content: a fun cozy christmas ornament loosely based off of crochet wind spinners add beads tassels pompoms or charms etc to the bottom of the ornament for extra flair you can choose to work each row in a different color for a fun twist or work it all in one color get creative each row is worked on the rs fasten_off at the end of each row and begin the next row where you began the previous row leave long tails on each side of your work free youtube tutorial available here https //www juniperandoakes com/blog/twistytree-crochetpattern 1 1 https //www juniperandoakes com/blog/twistytree-crochetpattern
